carmen_param_version_message Struct Reference
[The ParamDaemon Module (param_daemon)]

#include <param_messages.h>


Data Fields

int major
int minor
int revision
double timestamp
char * host

Detailed Description

This message reports the current version of carmen. Used to ensure that modules from incompatible versions of carmen are not being used together.
